titleStmt.title: The original of war, or, The causes of rebellion a sermon preached in the castle of Exon on the 15th of January, 1683, before the Right Reverend Father in God, Thomas Lord Bishop of Exon, and other His Majesties justices of the peace for the county of Devon / by Tho. Long ...
titleStmt.author: Long, Thomas, 1621-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. and F. Collins for Daniel Brown ... and are to be sold by Walter Davies ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
